text: The Lieutenant Governor of Colorado is the second-highest-ranking member of the Government of Colorado, United States. They replace the Governor of Colorado if they resign, die or are impeached. ==List== Lieutenant governors of the State of Colorado Lieutenant Governor Term in office Party Election Governor 1 Lafayette Head - January 14, 1879 Republican 1876 John Long Routt 2 Horace Tabor - January 9, 1883 Republican 1878 Frederick Walker Pitkin 1880 3 William H.
